title: A great perspective
review: It's certainly different! From the perspective of the man himself. I enjoyed seeing something unlike any other movie. The acting is superb and you learn things never told anywhere else.

title: What a ride!
review: This isn't your ordinary space movie. If you like human stories about achievement then you will love this. Don't listen to the unpatriotic rhetoric, I'm a veteran and I loved it. Ryan, Claire and the boys did an amazing job. The table scene will leave you speechless!
